B

BATCH_DEFAULT - Static variable in class com.scalien.scaliendb.Client
Default batch mode.
BATCH_NOAUTOSUBMIT - Static variable in class com.scalien.scaliendb.Client
Writes are batched, and if the batch limit is reached an exception is thrown.
BATCH_SINGLE - Static variable in class com.scalien.scaliendb.Client
Writes are sent one by one.
ByteRangeParams - Class in com.scalien.scaliendb
ByteRangeParams is a convenient way to specify the byte[] parameters for iteration when using Table.getKeyIterator(ByteRangeParams), Table.getKeyValueIterator(ByteRangeParams) and Table.count(ByteRangeParams).
ByteRangeParams() - Constructor for class com.scalien.scaliendb.ByteRangeParams

CONSISTENCY_ANY - Static variable in class com.scalien.scaliendb.Client
Get operations are served by any quorum member.
CONSISTENCY_RYW - Static variable in class com.scalien.scaliendb.Client
Get operations are served using read-your-writes semantics.
CONSISTENCY_STRICT - Static variable in class com.scalien.scaliendb.Client
Get operations are always served from the primary of each quorum.
